General.Name: King Slide Works Co Ltd
General.Description: King Slide Works Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, design, and sale of rail kits for servers and network communication equipment in Taiwan, China, the United States, and internationally. It offers ultra-thin server slide rail kits, electronic device rail kits, and cable management arm for cloud computing data centers. The company also provides kitchen/furniture solutions, including metal and wood drawer systems, undermount slides, ball bearing slides, epoxy coating drawer slides, and hinges for home appliances, motorhome and RVs, office equipment, medical storage, and other applications; and consumer electronics, such as mobile phones. In addition, it is involved in trading and wholesale of rail kits, slides, and accessories; sale of communication equipment; and import and export of goods and technologies. King Slide Works Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 136, Shun An Road, Kaohsiung, Taiwan
